english.segment1: He was given a thorn in his side. Was I given the same?. Around everycorner in this life. Lies are whispering. I follow what they say.
english.segment2: As demons hide, I'll curse your name, And I'll say it to your face. WhenI've died and touched the flame, I'll know who I should blame.
english.segment3: Theblankets of this leave me cold. Curse my thoughts and my eyes. Lookingback at all of this I know. Maybe I should of cried. Maybe I don'tmind.
english.segment4: As demons hide, I'll curse your name, And I'll say it to your face. WhenI've died and touched the flame, I'll know who I should blame.
english.segment5: You've got today, But you always say. That you'll change tomorrow. Good intentions fade. When you sit and say. that you'll change tomorrow.
english.segment6: We have stolen blood running through. Our veins like a cancer. We havefound a cure and it's you, And we have found the answer.
english.segment7: As demons lie, I speak your name, And I'll say it to your face. When I die, I'll saywith a smile. That you are the one to blame.
